briefdescription.para: Get widget representation of the one-dimensional color map editor action.

parameterdescription.para: Widget flags for the configuration of the widget
Pointer to node which is to be removed
Pointer to node of which to obtain the previous node

simplesect.para: Pointer to previous node (node if it has no previous node)

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to node of which to obtain the next node

simplesect.para: Pointer to next node (node if it has no previous node)

briefdescription.para: Load widget action from variant map.

parameterdescription.para: map representation of the widget action

briefdescription.para: Save widget action to variant map.

simplesect.para: Variant map representation of the widget action

briefdescription.para: Signals that a node is added.
Signals that a node is about to be removed.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to node which is about to be removed

briefdescription.para: Signals that a node is removed.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the node which is removed

briefdescription.para: Sort nodes and update their index.
Connect this action to a public action.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to public action to connect to
Whether to also connect descendant child actions

briefdescription.para: Disconnect this action from its public action.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to also disconnect descendant child actions

detaileddescription.para: Action class for manually defining a one-dimensional color map

simplesect.para: Thomas Kroes and Mitchell M. de Boer
